tool.name: MACS2 refinepeak
tool.description: Refine peak summits and give scores measuring balance of forward- backward tags (Experimental)
tool.command: macs2 refinepeak -b '${ bed_infile }' -i '${ infile }' --format '${ infile.extension.upper() }' --cutoff '${ cutoff }' --window-size '${ winsize }' --ofile '${ outfile }'

param.name: bed_infile
param.label: Candidate peak file in BED format

param.name: winsize
param.label: Scan window size on both side of the summit

tool.help:
**What it does**
This is **refinepeak** utility from the MACS2_ Package. It is an experimental utility that takes raw read alignments, refines peak summits and gives scores measuring balance of forward- backward tags. Inspired by the SPP_ pipeline.
.. _MACS2: https://github.com/taoliu/MACS .. _SPP: http://compbio.med.harvard.edu/Supplements/ChIP-seq/
@citation@
